FuncDef: This command facilitates a simplified method to configure the route target to be added to advertised routes or compared against received routes from other VRFs on the same or remote PE routers (via MP-BGP).
CLIs: vrf-target { ext-community | export ext-community | import ext-community }

ParaDef.Info: specifies the an extended BGP community in the type:x:y format. The value x can be an integer or IP address. The type can be the target or origin. x and y are 16-bit integers.
Specifies communities allowed to be accepted from remote PE neighbors.
Specifies communities allowed to be sent to remote PE neighbors.
